name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
J-20 chief designer Yang Wei and general manager Hao Zhaoping were dismissed, and the management of China Aviation Industry Corporation continued to adjust.
According to Caixin.com, the leadership team column of AVIC's official website changed on Saturday night, and Hao Zhaoping and Yang Wei's resumes were removed.
Public information shows that Yang Wei is 62 years old this year. At the age of 37, he became China's youngest aircraft chief designer. In 2018, he became the deputy general manager of AVIC. He also served as the chief designer of China's fifth-generation fighter J-20.
Hao Zhaoping is 57 years old this year. He has worked in the aerospace industry system for many years since 1994 and was promoted to general manager in 2022.
Previously, Tan Ruisong, the former chairman of AVIC, was dismissed in March 2023. Later, he was investigated by the official notification in August last year for suspected violations of discipline and law.
